life.client.StorageItems

Interface IStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Column, Foundation, FreeCell, Storage

    public interface IStorage
    Interface for a storage class to hold playing cards
    Author:
    Alex Life

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to this instance.
      Card getCard()
      Gets the newest card from this instance
      Card[] getCards()
      Gets all Cards in storage
      Card removeCard()
      Removes the newest card from this instance
      int size()
      Gets the number of elements in the storage container

    • Method Detail

      • addCard

        boolean addCard(Card card)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a card to this instance.
        Parameters:
        card - Card to be added
        Returns:
        true if card is added
        Throws:
        thrown - if the card cannot be added to this instance.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • removeCard

        Card removeCard()
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes the newest card from this instance
        Returns:
        Card that was removed
        Throws:
        thrown - if card being removed is not the card on the top of the pile
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getCard

        Card getCard()
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the newest card from this instance
        Returns:
        newest card added to storage
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if no elements are in storage

      • getCards

        Card[] getCards()
        Gets all Cards in storage
        Returns:
        array of cards

      • size

        int size()
        Gets the number of elements in the storage container
        Returns:
        number of elements being stored
